variable.name: SUBJECT_ID

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.description: Q2a. What is your community standing (1-10 scale)? [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]

variable.name: PDSA3
variable.description: Q3. Kind of work you do [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.value: Sick or on leave for health reasons
Homemaker, not working outside the home
Retired from my usual job and not working
Retired from my usual job but working for pay

variable.name: PDSA11

variable.name: PDSA13
variable.description: Q13. Where are you in life (1-10)? The tenth step stands for the best possible way of life for you and the first step stands for the worst possible way of life for you. Step 10 represents your best way of life and step 1 represents your worst way of life. [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: PDSA14
variable.description: Q14. Where were you in life 10 years ago (1-10). The tenth step stands for the best possible way of life for you and the first step stands for the worst possible way of life for you. Step 10 represents your best way of life and step 1 represents your worst way of life. [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: PDSA15
variable.description: Q15. Number best describes where would you like to be next year (1-10). The tenth step stands for the best possible way of life for you and the first step stands for the worst possible way of life for you. Step 10 represents your best way of life and step 1 represents your worst way of life. [Visit 1] [Personal Data - Socioeconomic Status, PDS]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.description: Q16. Number best describes where you expect to be next year (1-10).
